message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.HC 

The paper discusses the development of a novel method for incorporating object recognition processing into deep reinforcement learning models, which enables the formation of explanations and visualization of internal states of DRLNs. This work is highly relevant to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG) as it proposes a new method for improving the transparency of deep neural networks. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of deep reinforcement learning in image input domains, which is relevant to computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO) sub-categories. The paper also mentions the importance of transparency for user trust, which is relevant to the human-computer interaction (cs.HC) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the use of deep neural networks, which is relevant to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category.
